MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY4 postcode area of Shrewsbury, affecting properties in Baschurch and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.02PM  Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.15PM on 13th Novemeber 2020.
